name: Avenger
Lore: 'Key starship used to subjugate Outer Rim worlds. Reassigned to Death Squadron under the command of Captain Needa. Communications ship at the Battle of Endor.',
Text: 'May add 6 pilots, 8 passengers, 2 vehicles, and 4 TIEs. Has ship-docking capability. Permanent pilot aboard provides ability of 2. Subtract 2 from asteroid destiny draws targeting Avenger.',
